item.title: 你到底匯還是不匯？（當爬蟲遇上外匯…）– PyCon Taiwan 2019
item.description:
Description

Day 3, R0 10:50–11:20

介紹外匯與其市場, 以及匯率在金融科技公司裡扮演的角色. 日常工作中, 金融交易操作者(Treasury)必須隨時監控來自多管道的資訊 透過低買高賣與遠期交易等操作將公司財務風險分擔. 今日這些資訊多數已可依靠專業軟體的輔助來獲得, 如彭博(Bloomberg), 路透(Thomson Reuters)等大型企業有能力整合來自各國權威機構或一線銀行,企業的消息, 但新創公司所面向的客戶並不全然屬於此類機構, 多數的合作對象更可能是偏向在地性質的二三線銀行, 或技術能力有相對落差的在地金融服務供應商. 此時便有機會利用 Python 程式自動化將這些對象的資訊整合, 進而強化內部企業效率.

Slides not uploaded by the speaker.

Speaker: Kilik Kuo

改變自己先, 影響世界後.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/kilik-kuo-3923a454/
item.dc:creator: Kilik Kuo

item.title: R0 DAY03-03 Kernel-mapper (Tool to simplify the use of PyOpenCL) - Kilik Kuo (PyCon APAC 2015)
item.description:
Description

Speaker: Kilik Kuo

We'd like to provide a simpler way for people to utilize GPU power via PyOpenCL. Also provide a more clearer line to separate tasks easily for people we're good at OpenCL kernel programming & python programming.

About the speaker

ABOUT

Experience with Python for 5+ years. Being fascinated by the coding style and simplicity of expression, and the people who use it !

Current job - Software engineer in Mozilla Taiwan, worked on FxOS. Previous job - Associate principal engineer in CyberLink, Windows / Mac desktop application

個人網頁連結 https://www.facebook.com/kilik.kuo 組織/公司 Mozilla Taiwan 頭銜 Software Engineer

https://tw.pycon.org/2015apac/zh/program/48
